verses.verse: וַיַּ֥עַן <WH6030> answered אִיּ֗וֹב <WH347> And Job וַיֹּאמַֽר׃ <WH559> and said
אָ֭מְנָם <WH551> No doubt כִּ֣י <WH3588> then אַתֶּם־ <WH859> you עָ֑ם <WH5971> but ye [are] the people וְ֝עִמָּכֶ֗ם <WH5973> with תָּמ֥וּת <WH4191> shall die חָכְמָֽה׃ <WH2451> and wisdom

גַּם־ <WH1571> But לִ֤י לֵבָ֨ב ׀ <WH3824> I have understanding כְּֽמוֹכֶ֗ם <WH3644> to you yea who knoweth not such things לֹא־ <WH3808> I am not נֹפֵ֣ל <WH5307> as well as you I [am] not inferior אָנֹכִ֣י <WH595> I מִכֶּ֑ם <WH4480> does not וְאֶת־ <WH854> know מִי־ <WH4310> and who אֵ֥ין <WH369> else כְּמוֹ־ <WH3644> such אֵֽלֶּה׃ <WH428> another

שְׂחֹ֤ק <WH7814> I am [as] one mocked לְרֵעֵ֨הוּ ׀ <WH7453> of his neighbour אֶֽהְיֶ֗ה <WH1961> I am קֹרֵ֣א <WH7121> who calleth לֶ֭אֱלוֹהַּ <WH433> upon God וַֽיַּעֲנֵ֑הוּ <WH6030> and he answereth שְׂ֝ח֗וֹק <WH7814> [man is] laughed to scorn צַדִּ֥יק <WH6662> him the just תָּמִֽים׃ <WH8549> upright

לַפִּ֣יד <WH3940> [is as] a lamp בּ֭וּז <WH937> despised לְעַשְׁתּ֣וּת <WH6248> in the thought שַׁאֲנָ֑ן <WH7600> of him that is at ease נָ֝כ֗וֹן <WH3559> He that is ready לְמ֣וֹעֲדֵי <WH4571> to slip רָֽגֶל׃ <WH7272> with [his] feet

יִשְׁלָ֤יוּ <WH7951> prosper אֹֽהָלִ֨ים ׀ <WH168> The tabernacles לְשֹׁ֥דְדִ֗ים <WH7703> of robbers וּֽ֭בַטֻּחוֹת <WH987> are secure לְמַרְגִּ֣יזֵי <WH7264> and they that provoke אֵ֑ל <WH410> God לַאֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> Whom הֵבִ֖יא <WH935> bringeth אֱל֣וֹהַּ <WH433> God בְּיָדֽוֹ׃ <WH3027> into whose hand

וְֽאוּלָ֗ם <WH199> But שְׁאַל־ <WH7592> ask נָ֣א <WH4994> now בְהֵמ֣וֹת <WH929> now the beasts וְתֹרֶ֑ךָּ <WH3384> and they shall teach וְע֥וֹף <WH5775> thee and the fowls הַ֝שָּׁמַ֗יִם <WH8064> of the air וְיַגֶּד־ <WH5046> and they shall tell לָֽךְ׃

א֤וֹ <WH176> Or שִׂ֣יחַ <WH7878> Or speak לָאָ֣רֶץ <WH776> to the earth וְתֹרֶ֑ךָּ <WH3384> and it shall teach וִֽיסַפְּר֥וּ <WH5608> shall declare לְ֝ךָ֗ דְּגֵ֣י <WH1709> thee and the fishes הַיָּֽם׃ <WH3220> of the sea

מִ֭י <WH4310> Who לֹא־ <WH3808> does not יָדַ֣ע <WH3045> Who knoweth בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all אֵ֑לֶּה <WH428> these כִּ֥י <WH3588> That יַד־ <WH3027> not in all these that the hand יְ֝הוָה <WH3069> God עָ֣שְׂתָה <WH6213> hath wrought זֹּֽאת׃ <WH2063> In

אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> whose בְּ֭יָדוֹ <WH3027> In whose hand נֶ֣פֶשׁ <WH5315> [is] the soul כָּל־ <WH3605> of every חָ֑י <WH2416> of every living thing וְ֝ר֗וּחַ <WH7307> and the breath כָּל־ <WH3605> of all בְּשַׂר־ <WH1320> body אִֽישׁ׃ <WH376> he
הֲלֹא־ <WH3808> does not אֹ֭זֶן <WH241> Doth not the ear מִלִּ֣ין <WH4405> words תִּבְחָ֑ן <WH974> try וְ֝חֵ֗ךְ <WH2441> as the palate אֹ֣כֶל <WH400> eating יִטְעַם־ <WH2938> taste לֽוֹ׃
בִּֽישִׁישִׁ֥ים <WH3453> With the ancient חָכְמָ֑ה <WH2451> [is] wisdom וְאֹ֖רֶךְ <WH753> and in length יָמִ֣ים <WH3117> of days תְּבוּנָֽה׃ <WH8394> understanding
עִ֭מּוֹ <WH5973> with חָכְמָ֣ה <WH2451> With him [is] wisdom וּגְבוּרָ֑ה <WH1369> and strength ל֝֗וֹ עֵצָ֥ה <WH6098> he hath counsel וּתְבוּנָֽה׃ <WH8394> and understanding

הֵ֣ן <WH2005> Behold יַ֭הֲרוֹס <WH2040> Behold he breaketh down וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> cannot יִבָּנֶ֑ה <WH1129> and it cannot be built again יִסְגֹּ֥ר <WH5462> he shutteth up עַל־ <WH5921> and אִ֝֗ישׁ <WH376> a man וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> can be no יִפָּתֵֽחַ׃ <WH6605> and there can be no opening

הֵ֤ן <WH2005> Behold יַעְצֹ֣ר <WH6113> Behold he withholdeth בַּמַּ֣יִם <WH4325> the waters וְיִבָ֑שׁוּ <WH3001> and they dry up וִֽ֝ישַׁלְּחֵ֗ם <WH7971> also he sendeth them out וְיַ֖הַפְכוּ <WH2015> and they overturn אָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> the earth
עִ֭מּוֹ <WH5973> with עֹ֣ז <WH5797> With him [is] strength וְתֽוּשִׁיָּ֑ה <WH8454> and wisdom ל֝֗וֹ שֹׁגֵ֥ג <WH7683> the deceived וּמַשְׁגֶּֽה׃ <WH7686> and the deceiver
מוֹלִ֣יךְ <WH1980> walk יוֹעֲצִ֣ים <WH3289> counsellors שׁוֹלָ֑ל <WH7758> away spoiled וְֽשֹׁפְטִ֥ים <WH8199> and maketh the judges יְהוֹלֵֽל׃ <WH1984> fools
מוּסַ֣ר <WH4148> the bond מְלָכִ֣ים <WH4428> of kings פִּתֵּ֑חַ <WH6605> He looseth וַיֶּאְסֹ֥ר <WH631> and girdeth אֵ֝ז֗וֹר <WH232> with a girdle בְּמָתְנֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH4975> their loins
מוֹלִ֣יךְ <WH1980> walk כֹּהֲנִ֣ים <WH3548> princes שׁוֹלָ֑ל <WH7758> away spoiled וְאֵֽתָנִ֣ים <WH386> the mighty יְסַלֵּֽף׃ <WH5557> and overthroweth
מֵסִ֣יר <WH5493> He removeth away שָׂ֭פָה <WH8193> the speech לְנֶאֱמָנִ֑ים <WH539> of the trusty וְטַ֖עַם <WH2940> the understanding זְקֵנִ֣ים <WH2205> of the aged יִקָּֽח׃ <WH3947> and taketh away

שׁוֹפֵ֣ךְ <WH8210> He poureth בּ֭וּז <WH937> contempt עַל־ <WH5921> on נְדִיבִ֑ים <WH5081> upon princes וּמְזִ֖יחַ <WH4206> the strength אֲפִיקִ֣ים <WH650> of the mighty רִפָּֽה׃ <WH7503> and weakeneth

מְגַלֶּ֣ה <WH1540> He discovereth עֲ֭מֻקוֹת <WH6013> deep things מִנִּי־ <WH4480> from חֹ֑שֶׁךְ <WH2822> out of darkness וַיֹּצֵ֖א <WH3318> and bringeth out לָא֣וֹר <WH216> to light צַלְמָֽוֶת׃ <WH6757> the shadow of death

מַשְׂגִּ֣יא <WH7679> He increaseth לַ֭גּוֹיִם <WH1471> the nations וַֽיְאַבְּדֵ֑ם <WH6> and destroyeth שֹׁטֵ֥חַ <WH7849> them he enlargeth לַ֝גּוֹיִ֗ם <WH1471> the nations וַיַּנְחֵֽם׃ <WH5148> and straiteneth

מֵסִ֗יר <WH5493> He taketh away לֵ֭ב <WH3820> the heart רָאשֵׁ֣י <WH7218> of the chief עַם־ <WH5971> of the people הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> of the earth וַ֝יַּתְעֵ֗ם <WH8582> and causeth them to wander בְּתֹ֣הוּ <WH8414> in a wilderness לֹא־ <WH3808> no דָֽרֶךְ׃ <WH1870> [where there is] no way

יְמַֽשְׁשׁוּ־ <WH4959> They grope חֹ֥שֶׁךְ <WH2822> in the dark וְלֹא־ <WH3808> no א֑וֹר <WH216> without light וַ֝יַּתְעֵ֗ם <WH8582> and he maketh them to stagger כַּשִּׁכּֽוֹר׃ <WH7910> like [a] drunken
